verses.roman:
grāmera brāhmaṇa saba nava ghaṭa lañā
govinda-kuṇḍera jala ānila chāniñā

synonyms: grāmera—of the village; brāhmaṇa—brāhmaṇa priests; saba—all; nava—nine; ghaṭa—waterpots; lañā—bringing; govinda-kuṇḍera—of the lake known as Govinda-kuṇḍa; jala—the water; ānila—brought; chāniñā—filtering.
translation: All the brāhmaṇa priests of the village gathered together with nine waterpots, and water from Govinda-kuṇḍa lake was brought there and filtered.
